page.title: 10SOCIAL CONCERN
page.content:
People in our area are concerned about the opening of an{open cast coal {mine.}People held a meeting at the local hostelery the Shooters Arms and raised the following points :_ heavy lorries using unsuitable country roads water supplies springs important to the farms will be polluted or dwerted. damage to property. destruction of the enviroment.
The mining company state that only 10 or 7 lorries will use the road each day, landscaping will preserve the enviroment water supplies will be carefully checked and 30 jobs would be create.
The farmers are also worried about the ending of govermant subsides and the introduction of milk quotas.
